content: संनम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bend, stoop, incline; संनतांगी <ls>Ku. 1. 34</ls>; <ls>Bk. 2. 31</ls>; पर्वसु संनता <ls>V. 4. 26.</ls> {@--2@} To submit or subject oneself to, obey; संनमतामरीणां <ls>R. 18. 34.</ls> {@--3@} To bend down, bow down to. {@--4@} To make ready, prepare. {@--5@} To be accomplished. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To contract, bend together. {@--2@} To cause to bend or stoop. {@--3@} To make ready, prepare.
